channel.title: Devculture on Random Bits of Wisdom
channel.description: Recent content in Devculture on Random Bits of Wisdom

item.description: Estimates are such a loaded and dangerous endeavor for an engineer. To the point where companies mistakenly talk about estimates like its a “skill” that an engineer can learn. But the reality is that if you can make a probabalistically accurate estimate, then its likely that the task should have been automated by some other means already. @media (max-width: 640px) { .embed-image { min-width: 100%; } } Dear Startup: You have no idea how much that costs.
